description: Join Google's engineering team and work on innovative projects. You'll collaborate with experienced engineers to build scalable systems and solve challenging problems.
requirements: Strong programming skills in Java/C++/Python, Data Structures & Algorithms, Problem-solving ability

description: Work on modern web applications using React and Node.js. Contribute to real-world projects used by millions of users worldwide.
requirements: JavaScript/TypeScript, React/Vue, Node.js basics, RESTful API knowledge

description: Analyze large datasets and build machine learning models. Work with data science teams to derive insights and improve business metrics.
requirements: Python, Statistics, Machine Learning basics, SQL, Data visualization tools

description: Build robust backend systems for India's leading e-commerce platform. Optimize performance and ensure system reliability at scale.
requirements: Java/Python, Spring Boot, Databases (SQL/NoSQL), Microservices architecture understanding

description: Design user interfaces for creative software used by millions. Learn from world-class designers and contribute to product innovation.
requirements: Figma/Adobe XD proficiency, UI/UX principles, CSS basics, Design thinking methodology
